name: Beep! Beep! Deliveries
description:
Every summer Pook visits Uncle Bub who runs Beep! Beep! Deliveries company on Dawn Island. Meet Muffintops, Sleepy Wizard, 8-bit, Vibes, Jiggy & many more customers – all needing fresh deliveries fast. Drop off letters, gifts, essential supplies & help upgrade their stores or unlock quests. Everyone needs something & your deliveries change the town itself.
Your customers dream of better things, if only the Greedy King makes life hard. Expect crashes & smashes as he unleashes his pesky guards, boom-boys & Ghostly Bob.

THE FUN IS STACKING UP
Driving against the clock isn’t easy when you’re trying to balance as much as possible. Scoot Jr. only carries one small package, but each vehicle you unlock lets you carry more. Take it to the limit or go easy- your choice. Just BEEP! BEEP! your horn to warn the locals you’re coming. So get dropping those deliveries off, unlock the secrets of each island & get rid of The Greedy King!

FUN PHYSICS DRIVING + DELIVER CRAZY STUFF + GROOVY SOUNDTRACK

1 player
200MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).
